abstrakt ekak yanu paryeshanayakata elambauma ha ehi prathipala pilibanda saranshayak wina paryeshanayak nowe.abstrakt liyuwath ethanin ehata adhyayanaya kirima awashya nowanne aramuna paryeshanaya nowa lakunu ras kirima bawin eyin ehata yama awashya nowana bawini.me andamata abstrakt mangin usas wim labana aya ''abstrakt propesarla''lesa prasiddha wi sitinabawada mahacharya sasanka perera sandahan karayi.
